description: The crushing wheel is used to start processing raw resources more automatically
Some natural spawning blocks from create can be crushed to get resources the list is:
/4/Crimsite/4/ is crushed to get a 40% chance at raw crushed Iron and a nugget
/b/Asurine/b/ is crushed to get a 30% chance at raw crushed Zinc and a nugget
/a/Veridium/a/ is crushed to get a 80% chance at raw crushed Copper and a nugget
/e/Ochrum/e/ is crushed to get a 20% chance at raw crushed Gold and a nugget
